Name: Numbers & Letters
About the game: Numbers and Letters Mathematics puzzle number game for everyone. Improve your mental computation skills to become better at quick calculations and estimations Practice mathematics and solve equations in virtual reality in standing or sitting mode. The game objective is to solve equation(s) to achieve the target number given with the numbers provided using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. The Numbers game has three modes with four levels of difficulty in each mode Arcade – complete 20 equations successfully in the shortest possible time Time trial – complete as many equations successfully in 5 minutes Survival - endless level where a correct answer is needed to proceed Compete against the clock, earn achievements and a place on the leader boards The game allows you to understand the role of numerical relations and operators in mathematical problem solving while exploring number combinations and range of operators (subtraction, addition, multiplication and division) to solve equations. It can help to develop adaptive number knowledge skills and mathematical proficiency through exploring different strategies based on understanding of key concepts Letters game Improve your literacy skills and become better at spelling. The objective of the game is to complete the word by finding the missing letter. Play in virtual reality in standing or sitting mode The Letters game has three modes Arcade – complete 20 words successfully in the shortest possible time Time trial – complete as many words successfully in 5 minutes Survival - endless level where a correct answer is needed to proceed Compete against the clock, earn achievements and a place on the leader boards
